## LegacyClusterClient.callAsInternalUser property

Calls specified endpoint with provided clientParams on behalf of the OpenSearch Dashboards internal user. See [LegacyAPICaller](./opensearch-dashboards.legacyapicaller.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
callAsInternalUser: LegacyAPICaller;
```
